definitions: in a manner not in accordance with accepted standards, especially of morality or honesty

examples.text: councilors acted improperly in releasing the draft document
evidence is inadmissible if it is improperly obtained

shortDefinitions: in manner not in accordance with accepted standards

definitions: in a way that lacks modesty or decency

examples.text: the young woman is improperly attired with a sleeveless, low-necked dress

shortDefinitions: in way that lacks modesty or decency
